All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AAA
abstract piece that can flip along its vertical axis
AbstractGame
A partial implementation of the Game interface for Tetris-like falling shape games.
AbstractPiece
Abstract superclass for implementations of the Piece interface.
BasicGame
Very simple subclass of AbstractGame for experimentation.
BasicGenerator
Generator for Piece objects in BlockAddiction.
BBB
Represents a piece that transforms by "Sliding" \nChildren SnakingPiece CirclingPiece
CCC
Abstract piece that can rotate 90 degrees about the center
Cell
Container for an icon and a position.
CirclingPiece
Piece that circles around the bounding box clockwise
DDD
 
EEE
 
FFF
 
Game
Interface for a Tetris-like game.
GameMain
Main class for a GUI for a Tetris-type game sets up a GamePanel instance in a frame.
GamePanel
User interface for the main grid of a Tetris-like game.
GameStatus
Status values for a Tetris-like game.
Generator
Abstraction of a generator for game pieces in a Tetris-like video game.
Icon
Interface specifying an icon or block in a Tetris-like game.
LShapedPiece
Concrete class that represents an L shaped piece which can flip along its vertical axis
Piece
Interface for pieces used by Tetris-like games.
PlayLevel
Timings for speeding up the game as the score increases.
Position
Data container for a row and column.
PreviewPanel
Panel for displaying a preview of a block in a Tetris-style game.
QuotesPiece
Concrete class that represents a piece with a shape similar to qoutes which can be rotated 90 degrees about the center
RotatingSPiece
Concrete class that represents a piece in an "s" shape that can rotate 90 degrees about its center
SampleGame
Very simple subclass of AbstractGame for experimentation.
SampleGenerator
Very simple implementation of the Generator interface generates only red icons and only instance of SamplePiece.
SamplePiece
Partial implementation of the Piece interface for experimentation.
ScorePanel
Panel for displaying the score in a simple video game.
SnakingPiece
Concrete piece that represents a snaking piece which slides around its bounding box in a figure 8 pattern
TeePiece
